title: Stellar Review
description:
In the late 1970s, Bill Murray (backed by a young Paul Schafer) had a great SNL skit where he added lyrics to the Star Wars theme, including my favorite verse: Star Wars If they should bar wars, Please let these Star Wars Stay. With these lyrics in my head, I finally convinced my wife to […]

title: Kickstarters of the Week: 2/19/24
description:
February speeds along and we’ve got a nice-sized group of crowdfunding campaigns for you to browse. And for those of you thinking about going to Gen Con this year, don’t forget that housing registration is this week, prepare thyself. And in case you missed it, the BGQ team released our list of our Most Anticipated […]
